text: Encourage students to identify and express feelings
Encourage students to take turns when speaking in a group
Encourage students to answer in complete sentences
Offer possible responses when students have trouble answering
Encourage students to ask each other questions
Have students sit in a circle
Take turns during a variety of activities
Asking students to address each other by name
Give students choices regarding how they want to do (e.g. alone or in a group) or say something
If you have additional comments about ways you would like to adapt Voices Together strategies in the classroom, please let us know on the back of this sheet.
